not…bring forth for trouble. The New International Version renders this phrase as "bear children doomed to misfortune"; the Revised Standard Version, as "bear children for calamity." As Isaiah makes clear, these are challenges that will not come to those in the Millennium.

seed of the blessed. This expression seems to refer to the spiritual offspring of Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob, the heirs to the Abrahamic covenant. As the Revised Standard Version puts it, "They shall be the offspring of the blessed of the Lord."

their offspring. Not only shall the righteous seed of Abraham be blessed but so also shall their children in turn.
